My mum was fed up of buying 'expensive' party poppers for new years so one year she bought some really cheap and dangerous looking ones from chinatown.
She wanted me to test one but I didn't want to use them as they looked dangerous, so she had a massive go at me and so I did. It exploded it my hand and gave me 3rd degree burns on the hand (fingers) that was holding it. Still have the scars now and that was a good 15 years ago.
She made me take a week off of school so people wouldn't find out!

My mum does this but with wrapping paper that I wrap her presents in.
She buys really cheap and crap paper when she gives the family gifts and I buy decent one so she saves it and uses it for other gifts (for her friends. My parents aren't even poor.
I honestly have tried but deep down I know that either I'm hiding an attraction to them or that they are for me.
I had an old boss that used to make us have lunch with him everyday. Dude we need a break away from you!

You know I never thought about shaving my feet until I starting doing karate (at uni) and a guy said to me 'wow you have hairy feet', I just assumed that was normal until I looked over and saw that everyone else had shaved theirs.

I turned up for an interview and they asked me why I was 30 minutes late.
I got the interview through an agency (Adecco) and they told me 1345 (in person e-mail) but it was actually at 1300. I thought I was turning up 15 mins early at 1330.
I was actually at Adecco's office before hand, just to practice the interview questions (technical stuff) and I left there at 1315 as it was a 15 minute walk away. So it was utter bs that they thought my interview was at 1345.
I told them my agency got it wrong but that I did apologise and assured them I'm very punctual. I did the rest of the interview and tbh I nailed the questions and they said I had the job and would call me later with the proper offer.
When they did call they said that they spoke to Adecco and that they said that I was lying. I did not get the job offer.
I called Adecco and the stupid women just shouted at me that I was wrong, despite me having an email showing I was right. Still angry now, was a great job.
All about those gains.

And the amount of injunctions we have that mean you can go to gaol if you publish the actual truth but the celebrity has a legal injunction which means you can't discuss it on a public forum. Even saying 'x' has an injunction can get you into trouble. It's ridiculous.

Imagine if Obama slept with Trump's wife but you could go to gaol if you mentioned it online because Obama has an injunction about the story.

Speaking as a Spaniard it has to be bullfighting. I honestly haven't met a Spaniard who was anti bullfighting (usually it's just foreigners that are). It's bizarre that people don't see it as animal torture/cruelty. You are literally stabbing an animal slowly to death.
The defenders always so but it's part of our culture. So was slavery and child labour but we got rid of that. Not all things about our culture should be kept.
Honestly you wouldn't believe how often I argue with people over this. We even have a bullfighting channel (in hd no less) so you can watch animals being stabbed to death over breakfast :/

At the end of each month I used to have $2,500 surplus, which obviously didn't make me rich but it meant I didn't have money issues. I traveled a fair bit/took decent holidays and socialised a lot with various groups of friends and life was good. I had zero complaints.
Then it all came crashing down with I lost my great job (company folded) and haven't found a replacement job yet (despite searching like a maniac). I haven't been out in 3 months because I'm too poor and at present I -$200 in the bank. It is fucking depressing being poor.

Quite frankly this sucks as I've been using my Chansey with it's CP in the 400s to demolish pokemon with CPS in the 8/900s so as to get 1,000 each time, often I can take down two in a row.

With this update there's no way I could gain 2,000 with one pokemon, so now I'm wasting more potions/revive and battling is going to take much much longer :(

Made the mistaking of trying to help a close friend with a new department in his company (for free) and after putting in over three hundred hours in 3 months (along with me having a full time job) he actually had the audacity to criticise me for not getting enough done. I later had a private look at his computer and he basically spents the day watching youtube videos.
We also interviewed a few people and it was obvious to me who the best candidates were. He however chose 3 'hot' women, who quiet frankly were very under-qualified and interviewed poorly. One he solely chose because 'she had big breasts'. He slept with all of them too!
